## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (58bbebcacdf6a2d9ffd86189ba507ed33986ed75030617e008d99c380d0b62d8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'digitalexp-datasource-definitions' @ 9.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
